IPSTargetSiteCode

Intensional DefinitionAll descendants of 442083009 |Anatomical or acquired body structure (body structure)

Copyright Statement: Licensing note: This artefact includes content from SNOMED Clinical Terms® (SNOMED CT®) which is copyright of the International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO).
